lines.text: [James Bond's first scene, winning a game of chemin-de-fer]
I admire your courage, Miss...?
Trench. Sylvia Trench. I admire your luck, Mr...?
Bond. James Bond.
[Professor Dent tries to kill Bond, but his gun is out of bullets]
That's a Smith & Wesson, and you've had your six.
[shoots Dent twice]
East, West, just points of the compass, each as stupid as the other.
The Americans are fools. I offered my services, they refused. So did the East. Now they can both pay for their mistake.
World domination. The same old dream. Our asylums are full of people who think they're Naploeon. Or God.
James! Where have you been? I've been searching all over London for you.
[Picks up phone]
007 is here sir.
[Slaps Bond's hand away from the papers on her desk]
Moneypenny! What gives?
Me, given an ounce of encouragement. You've never taken me to dinner looking like this. You've never taken me to dinner...
I would, you know. Only "M" would have me court-martialed for... illegal use of government property.
Flattery will get you nowhere - but don't stop trying.
I'm a member of SPECTRE.
SPECTRE?
SPECTRE. Special Executive for Counter Intelligence, Terrorism, Revenge, Extortion. The four great cornerstones of power headed by the greatest brains in the world.
Correction, criminal brains.
The successful criminal brain is always superior. It has to be.
When did you say you had to leave?
Immediately... almost immediately.
Good evening, sir.
It happens to be 3 a.m. When do you sleep, 007?
Never on the firm's time, sir.

[to Bond]
Unfortunately, I misjudged you. You are just a stupid policeman...
[metal door opens and guards enter]
...whose luck has run out.
Don't worry. I'm not supposed to be here either. Are you alone?
What are you doing here? Are you looking for shells?
No, I'm just looking.
Stay where you are.
I promise you, I won't steal your shells.
I promise you, you won't either.
[Bond moves closer. Honey pulls out her dagger]
Stay where you are!
I can assure you, my intentions are strictly honorable.

[to Bond]
I was curious to see what kind of man you were. I thought there may be even a place for you with SPECTRE.
I'm flattered. I'd prefer the Revenge department. Of course, my first job would be finding the man who killed Strangways and Quarrel.
Tell me Miss Trench, do you play any other games?
[Showing prisoners Bond and Honey around their cell]
Don't hesitate to ring if there's anything else you want. Anything at all.
Two air tickets to London?
Tell me, does the toppling of American missiles really compensate for having no hands?
[Honey describes how she killed the man who had raped her]
I put a black widow spider underneath his mosquito net... a female, they're the worst. It took him a whole week to die.
[Bond looks shocked]
Did I do wrong?
Well, it wouldn't do to make a habit of it.
[Bond pulls up to the front of Government House with a dead man sitting up in the backseat]
Sergeant, make sure he doesn't get away.
How can you eat at a time like this?
I'm hungry. We don't know when we'll get the chance to eat again. Here, take this.

[whispering]
Careful. The whole place is probably wired for sound.
Now, don't worry, Quarrel. Everything's going to be fine.
You say so, Captain. Bottom part of where my belly used to be tells me different.
For me, Crab Key's going to be a gentle relaxation.
From what? Dames?
No, from being a clay pigeon.
One takes cyanide, another would let her arm be broken, neither will talk. Who puts that sort of fear into people?
[Bond admires a huge aquarium. Dr. No enters]
One million dollars, Mr. Bond. You were wondering what it cost.
As a matter of fact, I was.
Both hands on the wheel, Mr. Jones, I'm a very nervous passenger.
What should I say to an invitation from a strange gentleman?
You should say yes.

[shaking her head]
I should say maybe.

[Hearse chasing Bond drives off a cliff]
How did it happen?
I think they were on their way to a funeral.
That's a Dom Perignon '55, it would be a pity to break it
I prefer the '53 myself...

[to M, referring to Bond's Beretta]
Nice and light... in a lady's handbag.
Any comment, 007?
I disagree, sir. I've carried the Beretta for ten years, and I've never missed with it.

No, but it jameed on you last job, and you spent six months in hospital in consequence. When you carry a 00 number, you have a license to kill, not get killed. Furthermore, since I've been head of MI7
[sic - MI6]
there's been a forty percent drop in casualties, and I want to keep it that way. From now on you carry the Walther... unless you'd rather return to standard intelligence duties.
No sir, I would not.

[to Boothroyd]
Show him, Armourer.

[to Bond]
Walther PPK, 7.65 millimeter, with a delivery like a brick through a plate-glass window. The American CIA swear by them.

[Bond has overpowered Mr Jones on an isolated road]
Now talk!

[Breathlessly]
Alright! Let me have a cigarette.

[Bond gives him the packet of cigarettes. Jones starts gasping for air. Bond grabs him]
To hell with you!

[about his aquarium]
The glass is convex, 10 inches thick, which accounts for the magnifying effect.
Minnows pretending they're whales. Just like you on this island, Dr. No.
It depends, Mr. Bond, on which side of the glass you are.
You Limeys can be pretty touchy about trespassing.
You'll be sorry! You'll all be sorry, you rats!
Have you any idea what they'll do with us?
No idea. No door handles or windows, either.
It's a prison, then.
Mink-lined, with first-class service.
[James and Honey are marooned in a boat in the middle of the ocean. A Coast Guard boat carrying Leiter appears]
Well, hello! What are you doing here? Do you need help?
[Honey stands up in the boat]
I'm quite sure you don't.
I'll have a set of background papers to take - delivered to you at the airport in a self-destructive bag. You can study them during the flight. I want to know what's happened to Strangways.
One medium dry Vodka Martini, mixed like you said, sir, and not stirred.
Thank you.
I'm a friend of Commander Strangways.
Now, ain't that nice. I like people who's friends of people.
Where did you take him on your boat.
You see that, Captain. That there's the Caribbean. That's where. Fishing.
Felix Leiter, Central Intelligence Agency. You must be James Bond.
You mean we're fighting the same war?
Crab Key begins to interest me. What else do we know about this Chinese gentleman?
Dr. No.
Bond came to see me this morning.
Yes. I know. I gave orders that he should be killed. Why is he still alive?
Our attempts failed.
*Your* attempts failed. I do not like failure. You are not going to fail me again, Professor.
That's a naughty little habit. Listening at keyholes?
You believe in living dangerously. I can see that.
What do you mean?
Sitting around with wet hair, you'll die of pneumonia
How well do you know about animals? Did you ever see a mongoose dance? Or, a scorpion with sunstroke sting itself to death? Or, a praying mantis eat her husband after making love?
I hate to admit it, but, I haven't.
Well, I have.
Are you ready, Honey?
I suppose so.
I'm glad your hands are sweating too.
Of course, I'm scared too.
A medium dry martini, lemon peel, shaken, not stirred.
Vodka?
Of course.
What's going on behind my back?
Look, no hands!
